title: Red, Blue, and Green! What Colors Are On My Plate?: A color and food recognition book for kids.
description: A color and food recognition book for toddlers. The companion book to "1 2 3! What can I eat?" and "ABC Name My Food!", "Red, Blue, and Green! What colors are on my plate?" is a food-themed book for young readers. Children look through over 20 brightly colored "real images" of foods and name the color of each food. Fruits, vegetables, carbs, meats, and cheeses make up a beautiful rainbow-colored plate. Come along for the journey and discover new delicious foods.
author: Unabashed Media
